page.title: 12Our Village Policeman(cont)
page.content: once he even helped to deliver a baby. The most serious crime he has had to deal with was a murder investigation in Worcester. He finds it difficult to live a normal family life. People in the locality are constantly knocking on his door or telephoning him with all sorts of problems that they think a policeman should deal with. As a policeman he is a respected member of the community though people tend to be suspicious of him because of his job. This means he has very few close friends. In spite of these disadvantages he would still prefer to be a policeman in a village rather than in a large city.
